picked_headlines.summary: Real-time video translation using generative AI for multilingual conferencing.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a practical application of generative AI in video translation, addressing latency and complexity issues, making it relevant for both technical and managerial audiences interested in product innovation and operational efficiency.

picked_headlines.summary: Automated vehicle dispatching in ports with LLMs, reducing specialist reliance.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The integration of LLMs in automating port logistics offers significant operational improvements, appealing to stakeholders in engineering and management by showcasing a tangible application of AI in industry.

digest:
- *Enhancing Geo-localization for Crowdsourced Flood Imagery*: VPR-AttLLM uses LLMs for better retrieval in crisis scenarios. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.11811)
- *Artificial Hippocampus Networks*: Efficient long-context modeling in LLMs, reducing resource usage. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07318)
- *ProtoFlow*: Interpretable surgical AI models using dynamic scene graphs for improved accuracy. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.14092)
- *Privacy-Enhancing Infant Cry Classification*: Federated transformers enhance privacy and noise robustness. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.13880)
- *Complex Mathematical Expression Recognition*: CMER-Bench introduces new datasets for improved accuracy. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.13731)
- *MCP-SafetyBench*: Benchmarks LLM safety, revealing vulnerabilities in real-world scenarios. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.15163)
- *MIDUS*: Memory-infused depth up-scaling improves LLM efficiency. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.13751)
- *Towards Nepali-language LLMs*: Efficient GPT training with a Nepali BPE tokenizer. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.14585)
- *Residual GRU+MHSA*: Lightweight model for cardiovascular disease detection. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.14563)
- *SASQ*: Optimizes quantization for LLMs, enhancing accuracy and efficiency. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.14481)
